titles.title: Whereas there is no greater expression of freedom and liberty than the defense of the God-given right of an individual to hold, possess, and use private property.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H5862)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
6/23/2008--Introduced.
Declares that all U.S. citizens should remain secure in the possession of private property and no court, legislature, or executive shall, by predatory law or tyrannical force, obtain the property of any U.S. citizen for the benefit of another private citizen or corporation.
